summary: AN ORDINANCE establishing a Department of Contracting; re-establishing the Board of Public Works as head of the department, providing for a Director of Contracting, and defining their powers and duties; authorizing service charges; providing for certain appeals from decisions of the City Purchasing Agent; transferring employees and records; amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 3.18.080 (Section 3 of Ordinance 109129) and repealing Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 3.44 (Ordinance 107785).
